hioa.android.chess

Class PositionHashFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • hioa.android.chess.PositionHashFactory

  • public class PositionHashFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class hashes positions to check for draw by repetition
    Version:
    2013-11-20
    Author:
    Lars Sætaberget

    • Method Detail

      • drawByRepetition

        public boolean drawByRepetition()
        Checks all the hashed positions to see if this game should end in a draw by repetition
        Returns:
        True if the last entered position has occured 3 times during this game

      • expandArray

        private java.lang.String[] expandArray(java.lang.String[] array)
        Expands the array by ARRAY_INCREMENT number of spaces

      • getCurrentMovesIndex

        public int getCurrentMovesIndex()

      • getHashValue

        private java.lang.String getHashValue(Chesspiece piece)
        Returns the hash value used to represent a piece of this color and class
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to hash
        Returns:
        A hash value representing a piece of this type and color

      • getIntMoves

        public java.lang.String getIntMoves()
        Returns the array used to rebuild the state of the game
        Returns:
        A string that should be stored in the database

      • getMoves

        public java.lang.String getMoves()
        Gets a String representation of the move annotations for all the moves in this game seperated by SPLI
        Returns:
        A string of all the stored moves

      • getMovesArray

        public java.lang.String[] getMovesArray()
        Gets an array of all the chess annotations that are stored in this object
        Returns:
        An array of all the moves that have been made so far

      • hashPosition

        public void hashPosition(int color)
        Creates a hash of the current boardstate and stores it in the database.

        These hashes are used to draw the game if the exact same boardstate appears 3 times in 1 game

      • insertDrawByRepetition

        public void insertDrawByRepetition()
        Shifts the draw annotation to it's correct place. This is a bugfix for draws by repetitions

      • insertGameResult

        public void insertGameResult(int winningColor)
        Inserts an annotation representing the end of the game
        Parameters:
        winningColor - The color that won or DRAW (in this class)

      • insertIntMove

        private void insertIntMove(int row,
                 int column,
                 int oldRow,
                 int oldColumn)
        Inserts a move into the array responsible for saving the game state
        Parameters:
        row - the row that was moved to
        column - the column that was moved to
        oldRow - the row that was moved from
        oldColumn - the column that was moved from

      • insertMove

        public void insertMove(Chessboard board,
              Chesspiece piece,
              int row,
              int column,
              int oldRow,
              int oldColumn,
              Chesspiece captured,
              int flag,
              boolean check,
              boolean checkmate,
              Chesspiece other)
        Creates and stores the chess annotation for this move
        Parameters:
        board - The Chessboard where the move took place
        piece - The Chesspiece that moved
        row - The row that was moved to
        column - The column that was moved to
        oldRow - The row that was moved from
        oldColumn - The column that was moved from
        captured - The Chesspiece that was captured, or null if no capture took place
        flag - The promotion flag for this move
        check - True if the move ended in check(but not in checkmate)
        checkmate - True if the move ended in checkmate
        other - The other piece of the same type and color that could have moved to the same location

      • rebuildPosition

        public int rebuildPosition(java.lang.String moves)
        Rebuilds the last position in this string representing an array of moves seperated by SPLIT
        Parameters:
        moves - The string to be converted into an array of chess annotations
        Returns:
        The color who's turn it is

      • translateColumn

        private java.lang.String translateColumn(int column)
        Translates this column index to the chess annotation for columns
        Parameters:
        row - The column index to translate
        Returns:
        A string representing the chess annotation for this index

      • translateRow

        private java.lang.String translateRow(int row)
        Translates this row index to the chess annotation for rows
        Parameters:
        row - The row index to translate
        Returns:
        A string representing the chess annotation for this index
